desc: Specify the size of each device as seen by the filesystem
Specify the checksum algorithm.  Default is crc32c
Specify the profile for the data block groups
Specify the profile for the metadata block groups
Normally the data and metadata block groups are isolated
Specify the nodesize, the tree block size in which btrfs stores metadata
Specify the sectorsize, the minimum data block allocation unit
Specify a label for the filesystem
Do not perform whole device TRIM operation on devices that are capable of that
Populate the toplevel subvolume with files from rootdir
Try to compress files when using --rootdir
Specify that subdir is to be created as a subvolume rather than a regular dir…
Shrink the filesystem to its minimal size, only works with --rootdir option
A list of filesystem features turned on at mkfs time
Forcibly overwrite the block devices when an existing filesystem is detected
Print only error or warning messages
Create the filesystem with the given UUID
Create the filesystem with the given device-uuid UUID (also known as UUID_SUB…
Increase verbosity level, default is 1
Print the mkfs. btrfs version, builtin features and exit
Print help
Removed in 6. 3, was used to specify features not affecting on-disk format
